chapter.text: 55|1|atyant krpaasheel ne.
55|2|shiksha dee quraan kee.
55|3|useene utpann kiya manushy ko.
55|4|sikhaaya use saaf-saaf bolana.
55|5|soory tatha chandrama ek (niyamit) haî€¼isaab se hain.
55|6|tatha taare aur vrksh donon (use) sajda karate hain.
55|7|aur aakaash ko ooncha kiya aur rakh dee taraajoo.
55|8|taaki tum ullanghan na karo taraajoo (nyaay) mein.
55|9|tatha seedhee rakho taraajoo nyaay ke saath aur kam na tolo.
55|10|dharatee ko usane (rahane yogy) banaaya pooree utpatti ke lie.
55|11|jisamen meve tatha guchchhe vaale khajoor hain.
55|12|aur bhoose vaale ann tatha sugandhit (pushp) phool hain.
55|13|to (he manushy tatha jinn!) tum apane paalanahaar ke kin-kin upakaaron ko jhuthalaoge
55|14|usane utpann kiya manushy ko khanakhanaate theekaree jaise sookhe gaare se.
55|15|tatha utpann kiya jinnon ko agni kee jvaala se.
55|16|to tum donon apane paalanahaar ke kin-kin upakaaron ko jhuthalaoge
55|17|vah donon sooryoday[1] ke sthaanon tatha donon sooryaast ke sthaanon ka svaamee hai.
55|18|to tum donon apane paalanahaar ke kin-kin upakaaron ko jhuthalaoge
55|19|usane do saagar baha diye, jinaka sangam hota hai.
55|20|un donon ke beech ek aad hai. vah ek-doosare se mil nahin sakate.
55|21|to tum donon apane paalanahaar ke kin-kin upakaaron ko jhuthalaoge
55|22|nikalata hai un donon se motee tatha moonga.
55|23|to tum donon apane paalanahaar ke kin-kin upakaaron ko jhuthalaoge
55|24|tatha usee ke adhikaar mein hain jahaaz, khade kiye hue saagar mein parvaton jaise.
55|25|to tum donon apane paalanahaar ke kin-kin upakaaron ko jhuthalaoge
55|26|pratyek, jo dharatee par hain, naashavaan hain.
55|27|tatha shesh rah jaayega aapake prataapee sammaanit paalanahaar ka mukh (astitv).
55|28|to tum donon apane paalanahaar ke kin-kin upakaaron ko jhuthalaoge
55|29|useese maangate hain, jo aakaashon tatha dharatee mein hain. pratyek din vah ek naye kaary mein hai.
55|30|to tum donon apane paalanahaar ke kin-kin upakaaron ko jhuthalaoge
55|31|aur sheeghr hee ham poornatah aakarshit ho jaayenge tumhaaree or, he (dharatee ke) donon bojh[1] (janno aur manushyo)
55|32|to tum donon apane paalanahaar ke kin-kin upakaaron ko jhuthalaoge
55|33|he jinn tatha manushy ke samooh! yadi nikal sakate ho aakaashon tatha tharatee ke kinaaron se, to nikal bhaago aur tum nikal nahin sakoge bina badee shakti[1] ke.
55|34|to tum donon apane paalanahaar ke kin-kin upakaaron ko jhuthalaoge
55|35|tum donon par agni kee jvaala tatha dhuvaan chhoda jaayega. to tum apanee sahaayata nahin kar sakoge.
55|36|to tum donon apane paalanahaar ke kin-kin upakaaron ko jhuthalaoge
55|37|jab aakaash (pralay ke din) phat jaayega, to laal ho jaayega laal chamade ke samaan.
55|38|to tum donon apane paalanahaar ke kin-kin upakaaron ko jhuthalaoge
55|39|to us din nahin prashn kiya jaayega apane paap ka kisee manushy se aur na jinn se.
55|40|to tum donon apane paalanahaar ke kin-kin upakaaron ko jhuthalaoge
55|41|pahachaan liye jaayenge aparaadhee apane mukhon se, to pakada jaayega unake maathe ke baalon aur pairon ko.
55|42|to tum donon apane paalanahaar ke kin-kin upakaaron ko jhuthalaoge
55|43|yahee vo narak hai, jise jhooth kah rahe the aparaadhee.
55|44|ve phirate rahenge usake beech tatha khaulate paanee ke beech.
55|45|to tum donon apane paalanahaar ke kin-kin upakaaron ko jhuthalaoge
55|46|aur usake lie, jo dara apane paalanahaar ke samaksh khade hone se, do baag hain.
55|47|to tum donon apane paalanahaar ke kin-kin upakaaron ko jhuthalaoge
55|48|do baag, haree-bharee shaakhaon vaale.
55|49|to tum donon apane paalanahaar ke kin-kin upakaaron ko jhuthalaoge
55|50|un donon mein, do jal srot bahate honge.
55|51|to tum donon apane paalanahaar ke kin-kin upakaaron ko jhuthalaoge
55|52|unamen, pratyek phal ke do prakaar honge.
55|53|to tum donon apane paalanahaar ke kin-kin upakaaron ko jhuthalaoge
55|54|ve aise bistaron par takiye lagaaye hue honge, jinake star dabeez resham ke honge aur donon baagon (kee shaakhaayen) phalon se jhukee huee hongee.
55|55|to tum donon apane paalanahaar ke kin-kin upakaaron ko jhuthalaoge
55|56|unamen lajeelee aankhon vaalee striyaan hongee, jinhen haath nahin lagaaya hoga kisee manushy ne isase poorv aur na kisee jinn ne.
55|57|to tum donon apane paalanahaar ke kin-kin upakaaron ko jhuthalaoge
55|58|jaise vah heere aur monge hon.
55|59|to tum donon apane paalanahaar ke kin-kin upakaaron ko jhuthalaoge
55|60|upakaar ka badala upakaar hee hai.
55|61|to tum donon apane paalanahaar ke kin-kin upakaaron ko jhuthalaoge
55|62|tatha un donon ke siva[1] do baag honge.
55|63|to tum donon apane paalanahaar ke kin-kin upakaaron ko jhuthalaoge
55|64|donon hare-bhare honge.
55|65|to tum donon apane paalanahaar ke kin-kin upakaaron ko jhuthalaoge
55|66|un donon mein, do jal srot honge ubalate hue.
55|67|to tum donon apane paalanahaar ke kin-kin upakaaron ko jhuthalaoge
55|68|unamen, phal tatha khajoor aur anaar honge.
55|69|to tum donon apane paalanahaar ke kin-kin upakaaron ko jhuthalaoge
55|70|unamen, sucharita sundariyaan hongee.
55|71|to tum donon apane paalanahaar ke kin-kin upakaaron ko jhuthalaoge
55|72|goriyaan surakshit hongee khemon mein.
55|73|to tum donon apane paalanahaar ke kin-kin upakaaron ko jhuthalaoge
55|74|nahin haath lagaaya hoga[1] unhen kisee manushy ne isase poorv aur na kisee jinn ne.
55|75|to tum donon apane paalanahaar ke kin-kin upakaaron ko jhuthalaoge
55|76|ve takiye lagaaye hue honge hare galeechon tatha sundar bistaron par.
55|77|to tum donon apane paalanahaar ke kin-kin upakaaron ko jhuthalaoge
55|78|shubh hai aapake prataapee sammaanit paalanahaar ka naam.
